item.title: Drawio - Auto Generate Images
item.description: In last weeks, I got a new work to do, and envolves creating diagrams and DrawIO was the lucky chosen. As the diagrams will be used in documentation and exposed in GitHub, I need updated images. TLDR Combining snaps with electron apps do not mix well. Final solution, use old tools like incrond to captures the changes in the diagrams to auto generate the files.
